description: This file defines a React context for managing notes state, including a reducer, provider component, and custom hooks. It handles CRUD operations on notes via an external notesService, and exposes the state and actions to descendant components.

methods.name: notesReducer(state, action)
methods.description: Reducer function to handle note-related actions such as HYDRATE, CREATE, UPDATE, and DELETE.

methods.name: NotesProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component providing context with notes state, fetches initial notes, and supplies CRUD methods.

methods.name: useNotesContext()
methods.description: Hook to access the notes context value directly.

methods.name: get notes
methods.description: Getter for current list of notes from state.

methods.name: get loading
methods.description: Getter for current loading status from state.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Asynchronous function to create a new note via notesService and update state.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Asynchronous function to update an existing note via notesService and update state.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Asynchronous function to delete a note via notesService and update state.
